column1: When you struggle you get stressed. When you get stressed you go back to what you're comfortable doing -LaQuannon Jackson
You don't become confident by shouting affirmations in the mirror, but by having a stack of undeniable proof that you are who say you are. Outwork your self doubt. -Alex Hormozi
The chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken -Graham Weaver
There is no compression algorithm for experience
The more you know the less you do -Christine Wang
Knowledge without action is wastefulness and action with knowledge is foolishness -Al Ghazali
Don't compare your Chapter 1 to someone else's Chapter 20
You can either be judged because you created something or ignored because you left your greatness inside of you. Your call. -James Clear
Comparison is the thief of joy -Teddy Rosevelt
Change nothing and nothing will change
